attributes.additional_details: To block the £450K payoff of Geroge Entwistle pay following his total incompitace in running and controlling the BBC over the past 5 months. The govererment should block any payment pending an enquiry and review the appointment process by which Entwistle came into the role in the first place this includes a review of the actions taken by the board of govoners

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the BBC's Executive Board and the BBC Trust because the BBC is independent of Government.

It is the responsibility of the BBC Trust to ensure that the BBC delivers financial efficiency and hold the Executive to account for its performance in delivering value for money.
